/usr/bin/clang++ -std=c++11 -g -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX13.0.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=12.5 -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/Assignment_1.dir/src/main.cpp.o -o Assignment_1  /opt/homebrew/lib/libglfw.dylib libGLAD.a /opt/homebrew/lib/libglfw.dylib
